tagline: A cloudq worker that bulk deletes any job that has been expired in cloudq
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Cloudqw-expired
body:
# cloudqw-expired

Expired is a Cloudq worker that removes all expired jobs from cloudq

# install

``` sh
npm install cloudqw-expired
```

# use

``` javascript
var config = {
  protocol: 'http',
  host: 'localhost:3000',
  pathname: '/expired',
  interval: 60000
}

exp(config, 'http://localhost:5984/cloudq');

```
